thread.title: Highlights of the VA Report on David Shulkin’s Trip to Europe

author: WSJ Staff
title: Highlights of the VA Report on David Shulkin’s Trip to Europe
text:
The Office of Inspector General of the Department of Veterans Affairs on Wednesday issued a report finding that Secretary David Shulkin misspent taxpayer money and misused department resources in an official trip to Europe last year. Here are the highlights of the findings. Attorneys for Dr. Shulkin have said the document is “one-sided” and “casts aside evidence contradicting” the findings.
...
